text: Peeps, a question about Broccoli. Let's see if somebody can kindly shed some light on this for me
My understanding is that using strings to refer to Broccoli nodes is deprecated, and we should instead use broccoli-source. Is this actually the case?
If this is the case, why is broccoli-source a plugin, instead of being bundled with Broccoli?
the few times I used broccoli I referred to the trees by the name of the folder, so that being deprecated are news to me
yeah, it’s confusing, because all examples use that
